ajito_aku_030_akuboss_01:
You’ve done a real number on us, party crasher!
[VAR TRNAME(0000)], was it?[VAR 0114(0021)]
ajito_aku_030_akuboss_02:
I’m Giacomo! At the deck, I go by DJ Vice!
Call me whichever—it’s a vibe either way.[VAR 0114(0021)]
ajito_aku_030_akuboss_03:
Nice to meet you and all...but how ’bout we skip
straight to your outro?\c
Don’t worry—I’ll play you a sick requiem as you
crash and burn.[VAR 0114(0021)]
